1111010010111001 0100110111011111 1 -> sum: 0100001010011001, cout: 1
1000111000000000 0011001000110001 0 -> sum: 1100000000110001, cout: 0
0100001111011000 1000101101101100 1 -> sum: 1100111101000101, cout: 0

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
